Overnight Oats: Sweetener of choice (such as honey, maple syrup, or agave syrup), to taste
Optional add-ins: fruits, nuts, seeds, spices (e.g., chia seeds, sliced bananas, berries, almonds, cinnamon)
Quiche: 1 pre-made pie crust (or homemade pie crust)
1 cup milk (whole milk or half-and-half for a richer texture)
Garden Salad: 4 cups mixed salad greens (such as lettuce, spinach, arugula)
Optional: grated Parmesan cheese or crumbled feta cheese (for added flavor)
